results.content: I have background in Python, NLP, and little Django.  I wanted a quick UI solution.  This course delivered!!

response.content:
Hello Shah!

The full course code is already provided. Please follow the steps below:

Go to Section 2: Installation and creating Django project and Django app
---->At point 3. Installing Django and Spacy, creating and activating a virtual environment click on ---> Resources
---->Click on Develop Python Django Web NLP in order to download the full source code. The file is in zip format.

results.content: Great course. I learned a lot from the content presented. Thanks for the author.
results.content_html: Great course. I learned a lot from the content presented. Thanks for the author.

results.content:
Pros: 

1. The course virtually appears to be the only material on the internet which combines Django and NLP, so the content is super useful. 
2. If you know how to use Python and Spacy already, you can, indeed, learn how to develop an NLP*based web app in a quick way with this course. 

Cons: 

1. The course doesn't include tests, database management and deployment. 
2. The audio quality needs serious improvement. There is a lot of noise in the background. 
3. In the installation video (28 min), you need to wait for the instructor's computer to install everything. 
4. It is very difficult to follow the instructor due to the excessively low pitch.
5. There is no explanation/teaching. You simply code along for most parts. 

Overall, it is useful for people who already have an idea on how Python, Spacy and Django work.

Pros:

1. The course virtually appears to be the only material on the internet which combines Django and NLP, so the content is super useful.
2. If you know how to use Python and Spacy already, you can, indeed, learn how to develop an NLP*based web app in a quick way with this course.

Cons:

1. The course doesn't include tests, database management and deployment.
2. The audio quality needs serious improvement. There is a lot of noise in the background.
3. In the installation video (28 min), you need to wait for the instructor's computer to install everything.
4. It is very difficult to follow the instructor due to the excessively low pitch.
5. There is no explanation/teaching. You simply code along for most parts.

Overall, it is useful for people who already have an idea on how Python, Spacy and Django work.
